definitions.text: a rude expression intended to offend or hurt
examples: when a student made a stupid mistake he spared them no abuse
they yelled insults at the visiting team

definitions.text: a deliberately offensive act or something producing the effect of deliberate disrespect
examples: turning his back on me was a deliberate insult

definitions.text: treat, mention, or speak to rudely
examples: He insulted her with his rude remarks
the student who had betrayed his classmate was dissed by everyone
